description: Detects usage of Gpg4win to encrypt/decrypt files located in potentially suspicious locations.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
name: File Encryption/Decryption Via Gpg4win From Suspicious Locations
query: (event.category:process AND ((process.executable:(/.*\\[Gg][Pp][Gg]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Gg][Pp][Gg]2\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR (Product:/[Gg][Nn][Uu]\ [Pp][Rr][Ii][Vv][Aa][Cc][Yy]\ [Gg][Uu][Aa][Rr][Dd]\ \([Gg][Nn][Uu][Pp][Gg]\)/) OR (winlog.event_data.Description:/[Gg][Nn][Uu][Pp][Gg]’[Ss]\ [Oo][Pp][Ee][Nn][Pp][Gg][Pp]\ [Tt][Oo][Oo][Ll]/)) AND process.command_line:/.*\-[Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss][Pp][Hh][Rr][Aa][Ss][Ee].*/ AND process.command_line:(/.*\:\\[Pp][Ee][Rr][Ff][Ll][Oo][Gg][Ss]\\.*/ OR /.*\:\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*\:\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ll][Ii][Cc]\\.*/ OR /.*\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Rr][Oo][Aa][Mm][Ii][Nn][Gg]\\.*/))
